name: My Bluetooth Remote Control
tagline: This is the bluetooth remote control android app built with Xamarin, having the capability to control a remote pc.
body:
# MyRemoteControl
This is the android app built with Xamarin, having the capability to control a remote pc using bluetooth. This can be used for multiple scenarios including PPT controller for Microsoft Power Point Presentation or any other web based presentation controller like reveal.js or impress.js.

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/skumary2k/MyRemoteControl/master/Images/Screentshot1.png)

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/skumary2k/MyRemoteControl/master/Images/Screentshot2.png)``
